original_text: Day after day they spoke to him but he refused to comply. Therefore they told Haman about it to see whether Mordecai’s behavior would be tolerated, for he had told them he was a Jew.
korean_text: 날마다 권하되 모르드개가 듣지 아니하고 자기는 유다인임을 알렸더니 그들이 모르드개의 일이 어찌 되나 보고자 하여 하만에게 전하였더라

sentences.original_text: Day after day they spoke to him
Therefore they told Haman about it
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 이 일을 하만에게 말했습니다

sentences.original_text: to see whether Mordecai's behavior would be tolerated
